meanings.sent1: He practiced his golf swing, focusing on the outstroke.
meanings.sent2: The artist's outstroke on the canvas added depth to the painting.
meanings.sent3: During the game, his outstroke was so powerful that the ball flew into the bushes!
meanings.sent4: Her outstroke of kindness towards the stray cat warmed everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The outstroke of the pen created a beautiful signature on the paper.

meanings.sent1: In baseball, a player's outstroke can determine the outcome of the game.
meanings.sent2: The pitcher's outstroke was so fast that the batter couldn't even swing.
meanings.sent3: During the spelling bee, his outstroke of the word caused him to be eliminated.
meanings.sent4: Her outstroke of the opponent in the debate left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The outstroke of the clock signaled the end of the school day.
